scripts.dev:backend: if [ ! -d 'src/backend/.venv' ]; then echo '❌ Python virtual environment not found. Please run \`npm run setup:backend\` first.' && exit 1; fi && src/backend/.venv/bin/flask --app src/backend/server.py --debug run
scripts.setup:backend: python3 -m venv src/backend/.venv && src/backend/.venv/bin/pip install -r src/backend/requirements.txt && echo '✅ Python backend setup complete.'
